content: the shirley temple bralette was named after the talented and successful american actress singer and diplomat the shell used throughout has an air of the 50 s but with a modern twist it s the perfect feminine garment it s flattering without being too risque and it s incredibly comfortable for big and small breasts the design adapts to your body giving you support and movement this listing is for the pdf crochet pattern in english only it is comes in us terms and with lots and lots of very helpful pictures level - easy materials yarn 100 - 200 m of any sport yarn size 2 sample used alize diva stretch hooks 3 mm or size needed to meet gauge notions a tapestry needle gauge 26 sts 5 shells + 1 st x 12 shell row = 10 cm x 10 cm the pattern comes in five sizes xs s m l and xl please contact me if you need any clarification or if you have any questions regarding the pattern
